content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > share a photo of your finished scarf > and other crochet projects in the > sweet bee crochet community click > here to join 1 the beginner double_crochet scarf is a practical project that uses the basic stitches chains single_crochet and double_crochet and would make a wonderful wearable item for you or a friend written with beginners in mind this pattern contains written instructions with helpful photos ***inside the pattern you will find *** * detailed written instructions * clear photos * required tools approximate yardage required ***materials needed *** * approximately 240 yards of worsted weight acrylic yarn i used lion brand heartland in the cuyahoga valley colourway * 5mm hook * yarn needle * scissors * measuring tape **this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products ** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
